newsitem.title: USA: Micro-Integration names Frost as CFO.
newsitem.headline: Micro-Integration names Frost as CFO.

text.p: Micro-Integration Corp said on Monday that it had promoted Terry Frost to the position of vice president of finance and chief financial officer.
Frost, who joined Micro-Integration in February, will assume CFO responsibilities from the company's president and chief executive, John Parsons, the company said in a statement.
Prior to joining Micro-Integration, she spent more than 14 years employed in internal auditing positions and as controller at First Federal Savings Bank of Western Maryland, the company added.
Micro-Integration Corp provides systems integration, consultation and Internet services.
